name: Real Fidget Spinner Simulator pro, skill game
name_original: Real Fidget Spinner Simulator pro, skill game
description:
With this simulation game you can have fun with the Fidget Spinner as if they were real, since you have to keep it spinning in the center of the screen to get points. Use the accelerometer of your device to keep your toy in the center.
You have 4 spinner to choose from, free.
This game releases the stress, streamlines the reflexes and also, fun.
If it gets off the screen, you will lose a life. The game gets complicated over time.
Challenge your friends, who can keep the toy spinning longer.
It has augmented reality, use the camera to see your Spinner in real life!
